description: deck of a small ship with pulleys on booms
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1990; sold in August for POO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
text: This page came from one of Auguste Lepère’s sketchbooks. It demonstrates his acute eye and sure hand, honed during his early career as a magazine illustrator. With quick pencil strokes, he detailed the rigging of a sailboat, right down to the heft of the pulleys.
title: Ship's Deck
